_sText:
LORE

You lost your money, you lost your house, you lost everything. And all you have is Great Depression. But you're not alone, the entire country is affected by it. Your family is poor, and lives in an extremely old and broken down home. with barely any food to eat and water to drink. But you happen to come across an ad to join the states National Guard in a newspaper, and it has good pay that can get your family a better home and a normal life again. You apply and 2 years after training, you go on the mission of a lifetime. STOPPING TERRORISTS!! But this mission might be your last.

I hope you enjoy this well thought out andÂ
